LOS ANGELES PERMIT FILE REVIEW

Permit File Review
Red Flags First.

Most problems are obvious once the file is organized: missing finals, expired permits, unclear scope language, repeated corrections, and timeline gaps. PermitPulse turns the public record into a clean PDF and highlights the risk.

Start Fast-Track $499 Text FILE REVIEW

Designed for bidding, buying, and closeout decisions

Common red flags

FLAG
Expired permit (work stalled or never closed)
FLAG
Missing finals (scope completed but not finaled)
FLAG
Scope mismatch (claimed work vs record scope)
FLAG
Repeated corrections (pattern suggests delays)
FLAG
Timeline gaps (long pauses with unresolved status)

Flags depend on what’s publicly visible in the jurisdiction’s record.

What you receive

PDF
Timeline and status snapshot
PDF
Approved scope summary (as shown on record)
PDF
Open items list (when public)
PDF
Risk summary (the short version you can forward)
SRC
Source bundle (exports + optional retrieved docs)
